name: Braveheart
summary: Braveheart is a dynamic action / role-playing game with a unique combat system. King has sent you, the brave knight Richard, in search of the Holy Grail - an ancient chalice that has been protected for centuries by the most powerful creature on Earth, the Great Dragon! The king has promised the person who finds it not only half of the kingdom, but also his beautiful daughter’s hand in marriage. But uncovering this treasure will not be easy. You must use various tactics to fight the dangerous enemies and overcome the treacherous obstacles that stand in your way. Can you conquer the dark forces against you to find the Grail and claim your prize?
